```css
.nextra-sidebar-container {
  @apply block;                              /* Display: ensures visibility */
  @apply w-64 min-h-screen overflow-y-auto;  /* Layout: width, height, scrolling */
  @apply border-r border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-800;
  @apply bg-white dark:bg-gray-950;          /* Background colors */
}
```

- **`block`** - Makes the sidebar visible (display property)
- **`w-64`** - Sets fixed width of 256px (16rem)
- **`min-h-screen`** - Ensures sidebar spans full viewport height
- **`overflow-y-auto`** - Enables vertical scrolling when content overflows
- **`bg-white/dark:bg-gray-950`** - Proper background colors for light/dark modes
